item.description:
East Somerville Main Streets is hosting a free Brazilian music and movie event on Friday, September 5th.

At 7pm, there will be a little party with live Brazilian Bossa Nova music.

At 8pm, begins the screening of Deus e' Brasileiro (God is Brazilian).

Deus e' Brasileiro
Brazil, Portuguese with English Subtitles

In this funny, heartwarming story, God has become fed up with the human race and decides to take a vacation. He travels to Brazil in search of a Saint capable of taking over for a while, and there he meets Taoca, a young man with a passion for life that inspires God to rethink some of his ideas about the human race. Meet old friends and new neighbors, while having a night at the movies under the stars.

LOCATION:
A hidden parking lot behind an old fire station in East Somerville
165 Broadway at Cross Street (behind the Old Fire Station), East Somerville.

More information: http://eastsomerville...

617.623.3869

www.eastsomervillemainstreets.org

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Free Brazilian Movie and Music Event
